title: Functional Modeling of Derivative Concepts and Integrated GeoGebra Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational calculus and engineering mathematics knowledge, including basic differentiation concepts
context.additional_context: Enhancing procedural and conceptual understanding of differential concepts applicable to workplace tasks for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can connect visual changes in functions to differential concepts using GeoGebra simulations.
Learners can accurately calculate and interpret derivatives across multiple representations (geometric, algebraic, applied).
Learners can convert real-world problems into mathematical models and propose solutions using differentiation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
